<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update sys_domain="global" table="catalog_script_client"><catalog_script_client action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><active>false</active><applies_catalog>true</applies_catalog><applies_extended>false</applies_extended><applies_req_item>false</applies_req_item><applies_sc_task>false</applies_sc_task><applies_target_record>false</applies_target_record><applies_to>item</applies_to><cat_item/><cat_variable/><condition/><description/><field/><global>true</global><isolate_script>true</isolate_script><messages/><name>ctSepDate</name><order/><published_ref/><script><![CDATA[function onLoad() {
    //Type appropriate comment here, and begin script below
    var separationType = g_form.getValue('separation_type');
    if (separationType == 'Resignation' || seperationType =='Termination')
        g_form.setMandatory('seperation_date',true);
		g_form.setDisplay('seperation_date',true);
}]]></script><sys_class_name>catalog_script_client</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2024-03-12 14:55:40</sys_created_on><sys_domain>global</sys_domain><sys_domain_path>/</sys_domain_path><sys_id>1d721cd79774ce10dd5bb6cfe153af98</sys_id><sys_mod_count>0</sys_mod_count><sys_name>ctSepDate</sys_name><sys_overrides/><sys_package display_value="Human Resource" source="x_1124924_hr">be0ec27b97acc210dd5bb6cfe153afdd</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="Human Resource">be0ec27b97acc210dd5bb6cfe153afdd</sys_scope><sys_update_name>catalog_script_client_1d721cd79774ce10dd5bb6cfe153af98</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2024-03-12 14:55:40</sys_updated_on><table/><type>onLoad</type><ui_type>10</ui_type><variable_set/><view/></catalog_script_client></record_update>
